english_example_sentence: My dear friend, you don't walk long distances every day.
russian_example_sentence: Мой дорогой друг, ты не ходишь на большие расстояния каждый день.
turkish_example_sentence: Sevgili dostum, sen her gün uzun yollar yürümezsin.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sevgili dostum, sen her gün uzun yollar ______.
